'''Valley of Remembrance''' is a [[Domain]] located between [[Dawn Winery]] and [[Dragonspine]] in [[Mondstadt]]. Clearing this domain gives [[Artifacts]]. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorders are applied in this domain:
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I - V
|[[Physical]] DMG dealt by all party members increased by 75%.
|}

==Challenge Features==
Each level in this domain has the following Challenge Features:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Challenge Features
|-
!IV - V
|· The opponents in this challenge have decreased Physical RES. Use characters who excel in dealing Physical DMG to decrease challenge difficulty.
|}

==Enemies==
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Valley of Remembrance I
|objective=Defeat 23 opponents within 300 seconds
|enemies=Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer*10,Treasure Hoarders: Handyman*5,Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist*5,Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger*2,Treasure Hoarders: Seaman
}}
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Valley of Remembrance II
|objective=Defeat 16 opponents within 300 seconds
|enemies=Treasure Hoarders: Scout*4,Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer*3,Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer*5,Treasure Hoarders: Handyman,Treasure Hoarders: Crusher,Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist,Fatui Pyro Agent
}}
*The '''Fatui Pyro Agent''' is empowered and will periodically spawn a '''Pursuing Fireball''' that explodes three times once it reaches the player, dealing {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. During these three explosions, it remains stationary but will shift towards the player again for two more cycles.
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Valley of Remembrance III
|objective=Defeat 20 opponents within 1 minute (additional time will be gained after each kill).
|enemies=Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2,Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer*4,Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer*4,Treasure Hoarders: Handyman*4,Treasure Hoarders: Crusher,Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist*2,Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger,Fatui Pyro Agent,Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
}}
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Valley of Remembrance IV
|objective=Defeat 7 opponents within 360 seconds
|enemies=Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer,Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer,Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer,Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer,Treasure Hoarders: Seaman,Fatui Pyro Agent,Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
}}
*The '''Fatui Electro Cicin Mage''' is empowered and spawns a '''Lightning Stake''' around the player every ~11.5 secs for 5 secs. The Lightning Stake is connected by Electro energy on 2 sides with one side remaining open to form a "V" shaped fence that will deal {{Color|Electro DMG}} and stagger players that touch it.
{{Domain Enemies
|header=Valley of Remembrance V
|objective=Defeat 5 opponents within 360 seconds
|enemies=Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer*3,Fatui Pyro Agent,Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
}}

==Trivia==
* The level names of this domain are all 'Dance of Steel' which likely refers to the Ley Line Disorder which gives a bonus to {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
